invite_student:
Dear [FULLNAME],

You are invited to attend the [COURSENAME] ([COURSECODE]) face to face training workshop, with the following information:

Objectives: [COURSEDESCRIPTION]

Venue: [COURSEPLACE]

Time: [STARTTIME] – [ENDTIME]

This training course is open to you to register and join. However, number of available slots is limited for this session and places will be allocated on a first come first served basis. So don’t procrastinate – hurry up and secure your seat!

To register, you just need approval from your line manager then click to this LINK to confirm before [DEADLINE].

If you are interested in the training workshop, but cannot join, please feel free to share with us the reasons in the link! We may consider organizing another session if we have extra demand.

Thank you and best regards,

T&D Team

remind_exam:
Dear [FULLNAME],

This email from PHH Academy is to notify you that,

The exam: [EXAMNAME] is ready for you to complete,

From [STARTTIME] to [ENDTIME]

Please log in to the PHH Academy using this link https://academy.phh-group.com to do the test by the required time.

Note: This test must be taken continuously for 120 minutes (without pausing or stopping), so please arrange your time & workload to take the test in such a way that you can focus on achieving the best score possible.

Good Luck!

T&D Team
